title: WATCH LIVE | Thabethe continues Vrede dairy farm testimony at state capture inquiry
text:
WATCH LIVE | Thabethe continues Vrede dairy farm testimony at state capture inquiry

04 October, 11:56 AM

The former head of the Free State agriculture department, Peter Thabethe, continued his testimony at the state capture commission of inquiry in Johannesburg on Friday.

Thabethe has been giving evidence about his role in the controversial Vrede dairy farm project.

On Thursday, Thabethe told the commission the Public Protector's office summoned him last week to give evidence about the Estina dairy farm matter.

Live stream courtesy of SABC Digital News.
description: The former head of the Free State agriculture department, Peter Thabethe, has continued his testimony at the state capture commission of inquiry. Watch live.
